init(address,bytes).details: Initializes the EquityConfig contract with token details and investment parameters.

params._data: Encoded data containing minInvestment, maxInvestment, launchValuation, projectedYield, and DERatio.
params._token: The address of the token associated with this equity configuration.

params.actionID: A unique identifier for the update action.
A unique identifier for the update action.
A unique identifier for the update action.

params._status: The new status for off-chain pricing (true = enabled, false = disabled).

params.actionID: A unique identifier for the update action.

shareDividend(address,uint256,string,str.details: Distributes dividends to an investor, deducting applicable fees.

params._address: The investor's address receiving the dividend.
params._agent: The agent responsible for processing the dividend distribution.
params._dividendIds: The unique ID associated with the dividend.
params._userIds: The unique user ID associated with the investor.
params.stableCoin_: The address of the stablecoin used for dividend distribution.
